name: Kipple
description:
“When nobody's around, kipple reproduces itself… the entire universe is moving toward a final state of total, absolute kippleization.”

Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep? - Philip K. Dick

You are a tiny sentient astroid headed to Earth and hell bent on destruction & kippleization.

Use the arrow keys or gamepad to collect as much space-kipple as possible on your way & increase your destructive power.

Collide with objects smaller than you to increase your mass, and avoid larger objects, which will decrease it.
